name: SHR ConditionCategoryCS CodeSystem
title: SHR ConditionCategoryCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: A disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant, especially one that produces specific signs or symptoms or that affects a specific location and is not simply a direct result of physical injury.
concept.definition: A disorder of structure or function in a human, animal, or plant, especially one that produces specific signs or symptoms or that affects a specific location and is not simply a direct result of physical injury.

concept.display: A disability experienced by the subject.
concept.definition: A disability experienced by the subject.

concept.display: Something the subject is worried about, which may or may not have yet been manifested. The object of the concern does not have to be a medical disorder.
concept.definition: Something the subject is worried about, which may or may not have yet been manifested. The object of the concern does not have to be a medical disorder.

concept.display: A sign or manifestation of a deeper cause, of known or unknown etiology, e.g. pain or ringing in the ears.
concept.definition: A sign or manifestation of a deeper cause, of known or unknown etiology, e.g. pain or ringing in the ears.

concept.display: An adverse reaction to an intervention.
concept.definition: An adverse reaction to an intervention.
